title: How to use security as code to achieve DevSecOps | TechTarget
author: Paul Kirvan
description: Learn what security as code is and how SaC helps achieve DevSecOps and shift left to ensure security is addressed at every stage of the SDLC.
cntitle: 如何使用安全即代码实现 DevSecOps | TechTarget
cndescription: 了解什么是安全即代码以及 SaC 如何帮助实现 DevSecOps 并向左移，以确保在 SDLC 的每个阶段都解决安全问题。
